sub_title: Enterprise Account Executive - BeNeLux - Data Integration & Governance. (Talend|Qlik)
summary:
As a results-driven sales executive with a proven track record in spearheading international growth through net new direct sales opportunities and co-selling partnerships with local and international value-add resellers and system integrators.


With a robust + 25-year tenure in the Content & Data Management industry, I have consistently contributed to the success of software license sales and renewals across a spectrum of roles. My experience spans from consultant-level engagements to leadership roles in sales.

Over the course of my career, I have held diverse responsibilities, progressing from the capacity of a Technical Sales Consultant to that of a Senior Regional Sales Manager. This extensive journey equips me to engage as a trusted conversation partner, where I excel in active listening, deep comprehension, and constructive challenge of the prevailing norms.

I have been at the forefront of embracing novel product offerings, consistently adopting emerging technologies to enhance our offerings. My commitment to remaining an authority in the field is underscored by my investment in ongoing training, notably in Cloud Security & Governance. My proactive approach has not only positioned me as a trusted expert but has also made me a role model for colleagues when it comes to effectively positioning cloud solutions.

Thank you for considering my profile, and I look forward to the opportunity to further discuss how my expertise aligns seamlessly with your team's needs.

Sincerely,
Jaap-Jan Pepping.

profile_positions.title: Technical Consultant – Unified Messaging & workflow management

profile_positions.description:
•In 1989 I came to work for a start-up company Called All-SET. I was the first employee of that company that existed of 2 company owners. The company was started just 4 months earlier.
•All-set is an IT-solutions company for the SME market. Selling Software, computers, networks, custom software and web-solutions.
•Because of the size of the company I was able to get experience in a number of activities.
•We became reseller for major brands like Compaq, IBM, Microsoft and Novell.
•Along the way my position grow / specialist into managing the complete technical side of the company and reporting directly to the director. In this function I managed 5 to 6 staff.

volunteer_experiences.role: klankbordgroep/participatie lid namens het wijkoverleg Galecop (MIRT-verkenning OV en Wonen Regio Utrecht)
volunteer_experiences.description:
https://www.programma-uned.nl/
U Ned - een samenwerking van overheden - onderzoekt hoe we het OV-systeem in het zuidwestelijke- en oostelijke deel van de stad Utrecht en in het noordelijke deel van Nieuwegein kunnen verbeteren. Nadat eerder een aantal mogelijke kansrijke oplossingen in beeld zijn gebracht, gaat het onderzoek nu een nieuwe fase in. Daarom gaf het Ministerie van Infrastructuur & Milieu de Notitie Reikwijdte en Detailniveau (NRD) OV en Wonen vrij voor inspraak en participatie

De Stichting CodeUur wil kinderen van de basisschool digitaal vaardig maken door ze te leren programmeren. Programmeren leert kinderen creatief en logisch te denken.

De vanzelfsprekende interactie met techniek zorgt dat ze leren creëren ipv consumeren. Programmeren vergroot de digitale vaardigheden waar ze later in elk beroep profijt van hebben.

Ik ben een gastdocent die in groep 7 of 8 een uur programmeerles geeft.
Training services dogs during the first 14 months of their lives and other supporting activities.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member of the Elaboration Group (Uitwerkings groep) "Renewable Energy in Rijnenburg and Rijerscop"
volunteer_experiences.description:
As a group of 15 volunteers, we have been tasked by the city of Utrecht to work out the most efficient way to utilize 1000 hectares of land next to Utrecht for Renewable Energy while it won't be developed to build new houses until 2030. 
The goal is to facilitate renewable wind and sun energy for 60.000 houses. 
https://www.utrecht.nl/wonen-en-leven/milieu/duurzame-stad/energie/aanpak-energie-besparen-en-opwekken/duurzame-energie-in-rijnenburg-en-reijerscop/
